# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Proposal: T8493-230083A - Graphic Card - Flight Simulator

### Project Overview
The [Department of Public Works and Government Services](https://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/) is soliciting proposals from qualified suppliers to provide a Graphic Card - Flight Simulator for the Department of Transport Canada.

#### Key Information

* **Reference Number**: WS4426056912-Doc4426110914
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4426056912
* **Publication Date**: February 8, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: March 11, 2024, 2:00 p.m. EST
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Project Requirements
The Government of Canada seeks a Graphic Card - Flight Simulator that meets the specified requirements to support the Department of Transport Canada's flight simulation needs.

#### Key Evaluation Criteria
* Price: The lowest price proposal will be evaluated as the preferred tender.

#### Important Documents

* Tender Notice: [Download (.pdf)](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18747924?extsite=MTg3NDc5MjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Contact Information
For more information, please contact Oliver Morones, Procurement Specialist, [oliver.morones@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:oliver.morones@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Important Deadlines

* Tender Closing Date and Time: March 11, 2024, 2:00 p.m. EST
* Contract Award Date: Subject to evaluation and contract negotiations.

### Trade Agreements
This solicitation is governed by the [Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)](https://www.international.gc.ca/trade-commerce/trade-agreements-accords-commerciaux/agr-cfta2.aspx?lang=en) and is open to qualified suppliers from Canada and other participating countries in the CFTA. 

### Contracting Entity
The contracting entity for this tender is the [Department of Public Works and Government Services](https://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/), and the end-user entity is the [Department of Transport Canada](https://tc.gc.ca/fra/index-eng.htm).
